data.name: CyberLink PowerDirector 20 Ultra
data.detailed_description:
Create Professional Level Edits Effortlessly

Intuitive editing tools that help you set objects in motion, completely transform a scene's location, and create cinematic effects.

    Mask & Blend

    Layer, shape, and blend to create artistic scenes.


    Green Screen

    Remove backgrounds and create Hollywood-style special effects.


    Motion Tracking

    Add text and graphics that follow the motion of objects to elevate your footage.

Limitless Possibilities, Right at Your Fingertips

Bring your imagination to life with our wide array of tools to help customize your projects.

    Customizable Titles

    Easily create titles with unique customization tools and animated templates.


    Transitions

    Choose from a variety of styles to seamlessly connect your shots.

    Video Effects

    Transform and modify the look of your video with magical effects.


    LUTs & Color Match

    Match color to quickly balance or change the aesthetic of your videos.


    Screen Recording

    Capture, edit, and share video demos and tutorials to become the next YouTube star.

data.short_description: Create compelling content with powerful new effects and a streamlined user interface. No matter your level of proficiency, you can achieve spectacular results.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“„Der PowerDirector gefällt auch in diesem Jahr mit vielen kleinen Neuigkeiten, die das Programm sinnvoll erweitern und Spaß beim Videoschnitt machen. Ganz klar hat man dabei mit der Abo-Variante, sprich dem PowerDirector 365, den größten Mehrwert und profitiert von einer sehr guten und großen Medienbibliothek mit vielen kostenfrei herunterladbaren Inhalten.“ Videoaktiv 1/2021”
Testsieger Kauftipp - Test-Urteil: Sehr gut – Videoaktiv

“The best video editing software today is more powerful, easier to use, and more widely accessible than ever before. In fact, you won’t need to spend more than $100 for top-notch video editing software that lets even amateur video editors add special effects, apply stunning filters, cut together complex scenes, add musical scores and sound effects, and more. However, not all video editing software is built for the same audience, so you’ll need to think carefully about your needs.”
11-facher Gewinner der PCMag Editor’s Choice – PCMag

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 11, 10, 8/8.1, 7 (64 bit OS only)
  • Processor: Intel Core™ i-series and above Haswell (4th generation) processor: Core i7-4770 (only Core and Xeon branded), and above required for AI features.
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 10 or above is required to use AI tools and features
